author: mandrenguyen
body:
A new era is implemented which is just a copy of the XeXe era, but for the 2018 detector instead of the 2017 one. 
We expect additional customizations to this era will be necessary, since PbPb events are larger than XeXe.   
A new relval workflow is added to test this, number 158.
title: Era for pp reco on AA for the 2018 detector (10_0_X)
